metadata.title: CVE-2019-13115 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: In libssh2 before 1.9.0,kex_method_diffie_hellman_group_exchange_sha256_key_exchange in kex.c hasan integer overflow that could lead to an out-of-bounds read in the waypackets are read from the server. A remote attacker who compromises a SSHserver may be able to disclose sensitive information or cause a denial ofservice condition on the client system when a user connects to the server.This is related to an _libssh2_check_length mistake, and is different fromthe various issues fixed in 1.8.1, such as CVE-2019-3855.

criterions.comment: libssh2 package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
